item.title: Pivoting in politics, tech, antitrust and economic growth | Gary Shapiro interview
item.description: Gary Shapiro, the CEO of the CTA, is blunt when he articulates his views of politics, tech, antitrust law and economic growth.

item.title: aiOla unveils open source AI audio transcription model that obscures sensitive info in realtime
